trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection"></xref> class with the given array of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection"> </xref> classe con la matrice specificata di <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: If the `events` parameter is empty, this constructor creates an empty <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: Se il `events` parametro è vuoto, questo costruttore crea un vuoto <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection>classe.</xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> attribute applied to this member has the following <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.Resources%2A> property value: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>attributo applicato a questo membro ha i seguenti elementi <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.Resources%2A>valore della proprietà: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.Resources%2A> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> does not affect desktop applications (which are typically started by double-clicking an icon, typing a command, or entering a URL in a browser).
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>non influiscono sulle applicazioni desktop (che in genere vengono avviate facendo doppio clic su un'icona, digitando un comando oppure immettendo un URL in un browser).</xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> class or [SQL Server Programming and Host Protection Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere la <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>classe o [programmazione in SQL Server e attributi di protezione Host](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor"></xref> that provides the events for this collection.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di tipo <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor"> </xref> che fornisce gli eventi per questa raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection"></xref> class with the given array of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection"> </xref> classe con la matrice specificata di <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor"> </xref> oggetti.
La raccolta è facoltativamente di sola lettura.

trans-unit.source: If the `events` parameter is empty, this constructor creates an empty <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: Se il `events` parametro è vuoto, questo costruttore crea un vuoto <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection>classe.</xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> attribute applied to this class has the following <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.Resources%2A> property value: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Il <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>attributo applicato a questa classe ha i seguenti elementi <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.Resources%2A>valore della proprietà: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.Resources%2A> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> does not affect desktop applications (which are typically started by double-clicking an icon, typing a command, or entering a URL in a browser).
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>non influiscono sulle applicazioni desktop (che in genere vengono avviate facendo doppio clic su un'icona, digitando un comando oppure immettendo un URL in un browser).</xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> class or [SQL Server Programming and Host Protection Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere la <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>classe o [programmazione in SQL Server e attributi di protezione Host](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor"></xref> that provides the events for this collection.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di tipo <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor"> </xref> che fornisce gli eventi per questa raccolta.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to specify a read-only collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Per specificare una raccolta di sola lettura. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor"></xref> to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor"> </xref> alla fine della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> attribute applied to this class has the following <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.Resources%2A> property value: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE]> Di <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>attributo applicato a questa classe ha i seguenti elementi <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.Resources%2A>valore della proprietà: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.Resources%2A> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> does not affect desktop applications (which are typically started by double-clicking an icon, typing a command, or entering a URL in a browser).
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>non influiscono sulle applicazioni desktop (che in genere vengono avviate facendo doppio clic su un'icona, digitando un comando oppure immettendo un URL in un browser).</xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>
